channel.title: Help
channel.description: How do I edit requirements for certain spells? How do I get rid of certain teleports in a spellbook and replace them with the actual one How do I change the interface for a spell, like if you press camelot but it is set to like monsters, and it brings up an interface with multiple teleports, how do I get rid of that.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

hmm i dont know the exact files but like when u hover over the spell and it says like monster teleport , that can be changed in your client folder.

other ones i would just search for the words , like if monster teleport sends u options like rock crabs , i would search for rockcrabs and delete all those so it doesnt send those frames or whatever idk. your probably confused lol

Read full topic
